title: Omoi yo Hitotsu ni Nare
description: is a single by Aqours as well as an insert song in Love Live! Sunshine!! Season 1 Episode 11, sung by Chika Takami, Kanan Matsuura, Dia Kurosawa, You Watanabe, Yoshiko Tsushima, Hanamaru Kunikida, Mari Ohara and Ruby Kurosawa. It was released on November 9, 2016.
